Package com.group21

Class Pathfinder

java.lang.Object
com.group21.Pathfinder
public class Pathfinder extends Object
Pathfinder class represents the A* pathfinding algorithm used to find a path from a start node to a goal node. It creates nodes for every tile on the map, sets their status, and uses a cost function to determine the optimal path from start to goal.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    ArrayList<Node>
    pathList
    An ArrayList of nodes representing the final path found by the pathfinding algorithm.

  • Constructor Details

    • Pathfinder

      public Pathfinder(GamePanel gp)
      Constructor that initializes the Pathfinder object with a target GamePanel.
      Parameters:
      gp - the target GamePanel

  • Method Details

    • instantiateNode

      public void instantiateNode()
      Creates a node for every tile on the map. The nodes are stored in a 2D array for easy access.

    • resetNodes

      public void resetNodes()
      Resets nodes' status and all other settings. This method is used to reset the state of the pathfinding algorithm when a new path is being calculated.

    • setNodes

      public void setNodes(int startCol, int startRow, int goalCol, int goalRow)
      Sets the status of nodes.
      Parameters:
      startCol - starting column
      startRow - starting row
      goalCol - goal column
      goalRow - goal row

    • getCost

      public void getCost(Node node)
      Determines the cost for node in the pathfinding algorithm.
      Parameters:
      node - the target Node

    • search

      public boolean search()
      Searches for the best path using the pathfinding algorithm.
      Returns:
      true if the goal has been reached, false otherwise

    • openNode

      public void openNode(Node node)
      Opens a node.
      Parameters:
      node - the target Node

    • trackThePath

      public void trackThePath()
      Tracks the path using the pathfinding algorithm.
